hero.description: Computer Science student with a passion for software development and process automation. I focus on creating innovative and efficient solutions to optimize user experience.

talentpitch.description: I developed bots for the automated publication of content on social networks according to trends. Implemented scalable and monitorable robotisation systems with Airflow. Supported the development of front-end dashboards for clear visualisation of insights.

projects.cryptoAnalyzer: Web application focused on cryptographic algorithms, utilizing modern web technologies for a seamless user experience. It combines a dynamic frontend with a robust backend, leveraging tools like React, TypeScript, Python, and Flask.
projects.spaceDestroyer: Multiplayer spaceship combat game built with Python and Pygame. It features a client-server architecture using sockets and threading for network play. Players engage in space battles, shooting lasers to deplete their opponent's life points.
projects.mazeSolver: This project implements AI pathfinding algorithms like A* and Greedy Search to solve mazes. Built with Python and Pygame, it features interactive visualization, custom maze loading, and solution saving.
